ygData.subject: Re: JBOOTS:  I Need Them Bad....
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah ring of the ancients comes off a ancient cyclops. I know for a fact they spawn in SRO so that s your best bet. I believe they are the same level as giants.
ygData.messageBody:
Nah ring of the ancients comes off a ancient cyclops. I know for a fact they
spawn in SRO so that's your best bet. I believe they are the same level as
giants.

Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the 44th level

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin Neal <kevin@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 29, 1999 1:56 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] JBOOTS: I Need Them Bad....


>From: "Kevin Neal" <kevin@...>
>
>3,250 gold...not 325pp.. easiest way to get this to him is bind yourself
>near where he is, travel to the bank, then gate back when you have the
>money. Other wise, you'll be too overweigt to walk faster than snare.
>
>Ring of the Ancients comes off of a named giant somewhere in OOT I believe.
>It's 45th lvl I believe as well.
>
>
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Dino Buffetta <DBuffett@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Sent: Saturday, October 30, 1999 9:38 AM
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] JBOOTS: I Need Them Bad....
